about_the_game:
About

Brick Breaker is based on the classic arcade brick breaking game, with new 3D effects and animations in a 2D view, it brings a unique experience to the player.

How To Play

Use the paddle to move left and right to make the ball bounce and break all the bricks in the level, collect coins and powerups that drop from certain bricks.

Difficulty Modes

  • Very Easy - Great for young kids that are developing their hand eye coordination or grandparents who need to keep theirs active
  • Easy - Playing for fun
  • Medium - The default mode to play to complete the levels while having a lot of fun
  • Hard - Challenge yourself
  • Impossible - This is very difficult and will make this game probably the most difficult brick breaker you will ever play (Warning - You will swear!)

Features

25 levels
Global leaderboard to compare yourself to others
Achievements
Arrow to paddle to control ball direction on launch
Pickup items (Health, Gun to paddle, Increase paddle width)
Last five maps have a boss (spaceship) that shoots at you

highlighted.name: FINISHED THE GAME - DIFFICULTY VERY EASY! !

name: Brick Breaker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E5200 (2.5GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: Brick Breaker is based on the classic arcade brick breaking game, use the paddle to move left and right to make the ball bounce and break all the bricks in the level, collect coins and powerups that drop from certain bricks, select your difficulty from Very Easy to Impossible, enjoy all 25 levels!
